fields.Title of Presentation: Media literacy and context: Breaking through the noise
fields.Conference/Meeting Name: Association for Education in Journalism and Mass Communication
fields.Description/Abstract: Invited research panel session at Association for Education in Journalism and Mass Communication annual conference, Minneapolis. Modertator: Ann Auman, (Hawaii). Panelists: Seth Ashley (Boise State), Jennifer Fleming (Long Beach), Adam Maksl (Indiana U-Southeast), Bey-Ling Sha (San Diego State).
